inclusion.criterion: Patients awaiting a total hip replacement
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Anyone above the age of 40 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with neurologic conditions affecting mobility
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention.

notes: Patient's neurologic condition affecting mobility is a significant concern for trial eligibility.
